name: The Improv Games
description:
The Improv Games is a Party Game to help people learn and play Improv, It is basically a Tool to help learn and automate Improv setup without an audience!

Includes:
5 Games that get automated (Although 3 are mostly just timers)
A list of 300 words that can be chosen
Instructions for each game intended for online voice chat use
Tips for Improv

So get a group of friends on discord or in real life and try out or have fun doing some Improv!

Recommended players is 4+
Also I did not make these games up, these games are just normal short form improv games
